comment: many enzymes also have 3-oxidoreductase activity (see ec 1.1.1.145 or R03176) and convert 3beta-hydroxy-delta5-steroid into 3-oxo-delta4-steroid. general reaction (see R01837, R02216, R02499, R02840, R03327, R04163, R04678, R04849 and R09920)
name: 3-Oxo-delta5-steroid delta5-delat4-isomerase
